slide.title: Protected

list.bullet: Only callable by the same, or an inherited class

slide.example:
<?php
	class Bedroom {
		protected $action;

		function __construct() {
			$this->action = 'fun';
		}

		protected function peek() {
			echo $this->action. "\n";
		}
	}

	class Keyhole extends Bedroom {
		function peek() {
			echo $this->action. "\n";
		}
	}

	$kh = new Keyhole();
	$kh->peek();

	$br = new Bedroom();
	$br->peek();           /* Werkt niet */
? >
